column4: Dive into the bowels of the Petrovaradin Fortress, teleport into underground city and be a silent witness to all those mysteries.
Hike through beautiful deciduous forests and across meadows, while enjoying the view and fresh air.
Get active on the highest mountain in Serbia and enjoy in magnificant nature it has to offer.
Enjoy rich tradition, beautiful nature and artistic manifestations.
Walking tour - getting to know Novi Sad
